definitions.definition: To proofread.
To make resistant, especially to water.
To allow yeast-containing dough to rise.
To test the activeness of yeast.
The process of dough proofing.
To demonstrate that something is true or viable; to give proof for.
definitions.example: I will prove that my method is more effective than yours.

definitions.definition: To turn out; to manifest.
definitions.example: It proved to be a cold day.

definitions.definition: To turn out to be.
definitions.example: Have an exit strategy should your calculations prove incorrect.

definitions.definition: To put to the test, to make trial of.
To ascertain or establish the genuineness or validity of; to verify.
To experience.
To take a trial impression of; to take a proof of.
